segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene, quite a detailed line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that really catches my eye is the sink on the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my goodness, the water is just pouring over the front edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a continuous sheet of water onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is definitely forming and widening on the floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a woman standing right in front of the sink, totally oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice something so obvious right at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause some serious water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too, just running freely like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just calmly polishing a plate with a dish towel, her gaze fixed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain clearly isn't working, or maybe there's no plug in place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it's been overflowing like this already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this could become if someone doesn't intervene soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
